summary.para: Contains classes that contain methods to register internal DevExpress services for DevExpress Blazor components.
Contains extension methods that register the DevExpress middleware for client-side masks in Blazor Server applications.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.DevExpressWasmMasksApplicationBuilderExtensions.UseDevExpressBlazorWasmMasksStaticFiles(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)

summary.para: Enables serving static files for client-side masks in Blazor Server applications.

member.param: An object that defines the mechanisms to configure an application’s request pipeline.
member.returns: An object that defines the mechanisms to configure an application’s request pipeline.

summary.para: Contains extension methods to configure for client-side masks in Blazor Server applications.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.DevExpressWasmMasksServiceCollectionExtensions.AddDevExpressBlazorWasmMasks(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)

summary.para: Adds internal DevExpress Blazor services to and sets up client-side masks in Blazor Server applications.

member.param: A object that specifies the service collection.
